strongs_def: to begin under (quietly), i.e. come into existence (be present or at hand); expletively, to exist (as copula or subordinate to an adjective, participle, adverb or preposition, or as an auxiliary to a principal (verb)
outline:
1. to begin below, to make a beginning
    1. to begin
  2. to come forth, hence to be there, be ready, be at hand
  3. to be
